From Commando to CEO

Former British Army Officer turned entrepreneur, building award-winning health brands trusted by elite athletes and military personnel.

Get in touch

About Farard

Built from experience. Driven by purpose

Farard served over 16 years in the British Army, deploying on operations and elite training missions worldwide. Identified for fast-track promotion to Colonel, he chose instead to pursue a path focused on how we recover, perform and sustain peak capability without long-term cost.

Personal experience with repeated injury — culminating in a total hip replacement — highlighted a reliance on pharmaceutical pain management in high-performance environments. This sparked a relentless search for better, natural solutions.

Founder & CEO — Current Mission

A leader in performance, recovery & responsible innovation

Today, Farard leads Healthcare International Research with a vision rooted in longevity, trust and repeat performance — whether in sport, defence, corporate leadership or everyday life. His leadership philosophy brings military-grade rigour to wellness innovation, emphasising evidence, compliance and real-world impact.

The Brands

Award-winning brands changing how people recover

At the heart of Farard’s work are two global brands that have redefined natural recovery and skincare solutions: HEMPE and MotherSage. These products are backed by strategic investors as well as sporting ambassadors and distriubuted internationally.

Hempe

  • Topical CBD gels and relief products focused on muscle and joint recovery

  • First CBD gel to achieve NSF Certified for Sport® status — approved for elite athletes and professional environments

  • Multiple industry awards for wellness and pain relief products

Visit hempehelps.com

MotherSage

  • Natural CBD-based skincare range with beauty and wellness accolades

  • Recognised for skincare innovation and sustainable formulation

  • Winner of numerous global awards in beauty and skincare

Visit mothersage.com
